Title: Spacious 60s Home in Quiet Area
Review: Having stayed in many Airbnb's, I offer a comparative perspective. The house is spacious, well-located (to dining and shopping) and features a kid-friendly sunroom with games. However, more blankets and pillows are needed for added comfort and the worn linens should be updated. Essential amenities like an iron, hair dryer, and starter supplies (coffee, shampoo, individual soap) are lacking. These amenities, commonly found in hotels, should be provided in an Airbnb. Visible WiFi information would improve accessibility. The absence of smoke detectors in each bedroom is concerning. In conclusion, the house itself evoked a sense of nostalgia akin to staying in my grandmothers 1960s home, albeit with some updates in the past. The house offers considerable space and a peaceful atmosphere, attention to the aforementioned details could elevate the experience. I would stay here again overall just better aware how to prepare next time.
